titleStmt.title: To the right honorable Rich. Archb. of Canterburie, H.B. wisheth g.
titleStmt.author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.

notesStmt.note: Text begins: "When Barow and Greenwood, R.H. were to be pardoned, if they would haue come to Church ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
